title: Lease this one-bedroom and receive a $500 security deposit!
posting_body: An enhanced lifestyle in San Jose is in store for you at Thornbridge when you lease this one-bedroom, one-bathroom model!
Beyond the entry hall, the kitchen sets the striking tone with a breakfast bar, as well as updated appliances and cabinets in select homes.
The living room incorporates the comfort of air conditioning and heating with the modern feel of updated flooring.
The serenity of an attached patio or deck awaits you too.
In the bedroom, freshen up in the soaking tub of the bathroom then pick an outfit in the oversized walk-in closet.
As a resident, take advantage of the five on-site laundry facilities, the business center, and plentiful on-site parking.
During your free time, come by the pool to cool down or catch up with neighbors while unwinding on the poolside sundeck.
Discuss move-in details with a leasing agent today!
*$500 security deposit based on approved credit*
